sentences.en: Do you feel disposed for a bath?
Engine oil cannot be disposed of down drains.
sentences.cn: 发动机油不能被清理到下水道中。

sentences.en: He disposed his books on the shelves.
He felt well disposed towards her.
He who is disposed for mischief will never want occasion.
sentences.cn: 存心要使坏,不怕没机会.

sentences.en: She is disposed to sudden bouts of depression.
sentences.cn: 她动不动就会突然抑郁症发作.

sentences.en: She seems favourably disposed to the move.
sentences.cn: 她似乎很赞成这项举措.

sentences.en: The boss was ill disposed towards his secretary.
sentences.cn: 老板对他的秘书很反感.

sentences.en: The committee soon disposed of business.
sentences.cn: 委员会很快就把问题解决了.

sentences.en: The experienced politician disposed of the attack in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 这个富有经验的政治家几分钟内就挫败了这一进攻.

sentences.en: The goods have been disposed of.
The taxpayer are unfavourably disposed towards the recent tax increase.
sentences.cn: 纳税者对最近的增加税收十分反感.

sentences.en: They disposed troops along the river.
They were all sympathetically disposed towards her bitter experience.
sentences.cn: 他们都对她的悲惨遭遇寄予同情.

sentences.en: We passed one or two dwellings, but were not disposed to stop.
sentences.cn: 我们经过一两处住所，却无意停下。

words.tran_cn: 可任意处理的；可自由使用的；用完即可丢弃的
处置；[心理] 性情；[军] 部署；倾向
处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向

phrases.tran_cn: 处理；转让；解决；吃光；除掉；卖掉

trans.tran_cn: 有意于，有…倾向的，愿意的，想干的
trans.tran_en: If you are disposed to do something, you are willing or eager to do it

trans.tran_cn: 使倾向于，处理(dispose的过去式和过去分词)
